title: Keys arent working when game starts
body:
I have found this discovery awhile ago, I have also tried to get this issue addressed but it still is lurking. The issue is, whenever the game starts and champions/summoners are spawned into the platform. They keys qwer etc do not work unless I relogin. This can cause a very big set back and can be a hindrance to gameplay. 

so riot upon my discovery i would like 7 rp i am willing to negotiate for more.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you try [repairing your client](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6). Let me know if that helps at all.
